channel.title: Server login help
channel.description: [sub][font=comic sans ms][size=18pt]Okay so i'm making a server off of combattscape and I ran it just to find any bugs and stuff so i also downloaded the client i posted it on fubergen but... when people try to login there not able to... it says server conection time out my server is online i posted one before but i can login on the client i also posted as my backround image the says to download the client(i dont know if people payed attention to it..) what do i do so they can login from any client?[/size][/font][/sub] I THINK.... THIS GOES IN CLIENT HELP BUT FITS IN BOTH...

item.title: Server login help
item.dc:creator: @lary370 lary370
item.description:
@lary370 wrote:

[sub][font=comic sans ms][size=18pt]Okay so i’m making a server off of combattscape
and
I ran it just to find any bugs and stuff
so
i also downloaded the client
i posted it on fubergen
but…
when people try to login there not able to… it says
server conection time out
my server is online i posted one before
but i can login on the client i also posted as my backround image the says to download the client(i dont know if people payed attention to it…)
what do i do so they can login from any client?[/size][/font][/sub]
I THINK… THIS GOES IN CLIENT HELP BUT FITS IN BOTH…
